# load in data from external results and make rank plots w/ highlighted RNF4
```{r}
library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)

aza <- fread("AZA_v_T0_MAGECK.txt")
gdac <- fread("GDAC_v_T0_MAGECK.txt")
colnames(aza) <- gsub("\\|", "_", colnames(aza))
colnames(gdac) <- gsub("\\|", "_", colnames(gdac))

ggplot(aza) +
  geom_point(aes(x = "pos_rank", y = "pos_lfc"))

plot(rank(aza$pos_lfc), aza$pos_lfc)
plot(rank(gdac$pos_lfc), gdac$pos_lfc)
```
